name: 【VR】Physical Exam / イタズラ身体測定
name_original: 【VR】Physical Exam / イタズラ身体測定
description:
This game is for Meta Quest2 only.
If it does not work by Meta Quest2, changing the OpenXR settings may improve the situation. Please check the manual for details.
〇 Product Summary
Bringing your dreams to life in VR!
Under the guise of a medical examination, it's an all-you-can-bang paradise!
Spread your arms and legs for me? Good. Now, this stethoscope is going to feel a little cold... Let's take off your clothes and make sure your chest feels good, okay...?
Escalate things a little at a time and when she's gagging for it, stick something in her mouth or her p*ssy!
Finally, she'll beg you for sex!
〇 Features
[A Variety of Features] There are various new options such as tit/head grabbing, climax direction, kissing, fellatio, insertion, ejaculation, and more!
[Reactions] Based on her excitement or disgust, her reaction to your movements will change.
[H Scenes] Not only do you get to examine her body, but there are sex scenes too! Raise her horniness and she'll beg you for it!
[Pass-through]: Your room becomes the background! Experience sex in a familiar room!
[Hand Tracking]: Touch the character with your own hands! No controller needed!
